statements: SELECT * FROM parent_contacts WHERE parent_id = 1;

SELECT c.contact_type, c.contact_info, ch.child_name FROM contacts c JOIN children ch ON c.child_id = ch.child_id;

SELECT parent_name, parent_phone FROM parents JOIN children ON parents.parent_id = children.parent_id WHERE children.child_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE contact_type = 'Emergency' AND contact_info LIKE '%@gmail.com%';

SELECT parent_name, parent_phone, child_name, child_dob FROM parents JOIN children ON parents.parent_id = children.parent_id JOIN contacts ON children.child_id = contacts.child_id WHERE parent_name = 'John' AND contact_type = 'Emergency';
